definition.S: Amazon Aurora is a MySQL and PostgreSQL-compatible relational database that combines the performance and availability of high-end commercial databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases.
AWS Global Accelerator improves the availability and performance of your applications by directing traffic to the optimal endpoint via AWS global network.
AWS Shield is a managed DDoS protection service that safeguards applications running on AWS from network and transport layer attacks.
AWS WAF helps protect web applications from common web exploits by allowing you to monitor and block malicious HTTP requests.
Amazon EKS is a managed Kubernetes service that simplifies the deployment and management of Kubernetes on AWS.
AWS IoT Core is a managed cloud platform that lets connected devices interact with cloud applications and other devices securely.
Amazon Route 53 is a scalable DNS web service designed to provide reliable and cost-effective routing for web applications.
AWS Step Functions lets you coordinate multiple AWS services into serverless workflows to build and scale applications quickly.
Amazon SES is a cloud-based email sending service that supports transactional and marketing emails.
AWS Trusted Advisor provides real-time recommendations to optimize your AWS infrastructure in terms of cost, security, performance, and fault tolerance.
Amazon Rekognition is a machine learning service that allows you to add image and video analysis to your applications.
AWS Glue is a fully managed ETL service that makes it easy to prepare and load data for analytics.
Amazon Athena is an interactive query service that makes it easy to analyze data in Amazon S3 using standard SQL.
AWS CloudTrail enables governance, compliance, and operational auditing of your AWS account by recording account activity and API calls.
Amazon S3 Glacier is a low-cost storage service for archiving and long-term data backup.
AWS Outposts brings AWS infrastructure and services to your on-premises data centers for a consistent hybrid cloud experience.
Amazon Lex is a service for building conversational interfaces into applications using voice and text.
Amazon Polly turns text into lifelike speech, enabling applications to talk and build new categories of speech-enabled products.
AWS Lambda@Edge lets you run Lambda functions to customize content delivery from Amazon CloudFront.
AWS Snowball is a data migration and edge computing device for securely transferring large amounts of data into and out of AWS.
AWS OpsWorks is a configuration management service that provides managed instances of Chef and Puppet for automating server configurations.
AWS Direct Connect enables a dedicated network connection from your on-premises data center to AWS.
AWS Elastic Beanstalk is a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) offering that makes it easy to deploy and scale web applications.
Amazon QuickSight is a business intelligence service that makes it easy to build visualizations and perform ad hoc analysis.
AWS Ground Station enables satellite operators to communicate with their satellites and process data using AWS infrastructure.
